錯誤：無法獲取影片資訊\n{error}:
Error: Unable to get video information
{error}
錯誤：獲取影片資訊逾時，請檢查網路連線或嘗試簡化URL: Error: Timeout while getting video information, please check your network connection or try simplifying the URL
錯誤：解析影片資訊失敗，收到的不是有效的JSON資料: Error: Failed to parse video information, received data is not valid JSON
獲取影片資訊時發生錯誤：{error}: Error occurred while getting video information: {error}
偵測到 macOS 作業系統，將使用 VideoToolbox 硬體加速: Detected macOS operating system, will use VideoToolbox hardware acceleration
偵測到 NVIDIA GPU，將使用 NVENC 硬體加速: Detected NVIDIA GPU, will use NVENC hardware acceleration
偵測到 AMD GPU，將使用 AMF 硬體加速: Detected AMD GPU, will use AMF hardware acceleration
偵測到 Intel GPU，將使用 QSV 硬體加速: Detected Intel GPU, will use QSV hardware acceleration
偵測到 NVIDIA GPU，將使用 NVENC 硬體加速: Detected NVIDIA GPU, will use NVENC hardware acceleration
偵測到 VAAPI 支援 (Intel/AMD GPU)，將使用 VAAPI 硬: Detected VAAPI support (Intel/AMD GPU), will use VAAPI hardware acceleration
未偵測到支援的硬體加速，將使用 CPU 編碼: No supported hardware acceleration detected, will use CPU encoding
即將下載影片，使用以下命令：: About to download video using the following command:
警告：無法確定下載的檔案位置: Warning: Cannot determine the location of the downloaded file
錯誤：找不到要轉換的檔案: Error: Cannot find the file to convert
Starting to convert {file} to H.265 format...
無法確定原始音訊位元率，使用預設值：{bitrate}: Cannot determine original audio bitrate, using default value: {bitrate}
Hardware acceleration conversion failed, trying CPU software encoding...
Hardware acceleration conversion failed, trying CPU software encoding...
測試 ffmpeg 能力時發生錯誤: {error}: Error occurred when testing ffmpeg capabilities: {error}
錯誤：未找到 yt-dlp。請先安裝 yt-dlp。: Error: yt-dlp not found. Please install yt-dlp first.
可以使用以下命令安裝：: You can install it using the following command:
錯誤：未找到 ffmpeg。請先安裝 ffmpeg。: Error: ffmpeg not found. Please install ffmpeg first.
可以參考 https://ffmpeg.org/download.html 安裝: You can refer to https://ffmpeg.org/download.html for installation guide
警告：URL格式可能不正確，請確認是否為有效的YouTube影片URL: Warning: URL format may be incorrect, please confirm if it is a valid YouTube video URL
將使用目前目錄作為輸出目錄: Will use current directory as output directory
Will use current directory as output directory
